title: Applications are now open for Google for Startups Growth Academy: AI for Health
description: Google’s work in health is centered around advancing healthcare through AI. And that includes supporting healthtech entrepreneurs through programs like Google for Startu…
excerpt: Google’s work in health is centered around advancing healthcare through AI. And that includes supporting healthtech entrepreneurs through programs like Google for Startups Growth Academy: AI for Health. Applications for the third cohort of this equity-free program are open until January 31 to seed to Series A startups based in Europe, Africa and the Middle East that use AI to address critical health and wellbeing challenges.Over three months, selected startup teams receive tailored workshops, mentorship from Google experts and networking opportunities to help grow their businesses. Check out our website to learn more and apply.
text: Google’s work in health is centered around advancing healthcare through AI. And that includes supporting healthtech entrepreneurs through programs like Google for Startups Growth Academy: AI for Health. Applications for the third cohort of this equity-free program are open until January 31 to seed to Series A startups based in Europe, Africa and the Middle East that use AI to address critical health and wellbeing challenges.Over three months, selected startup teams receive tailored workshops, mentorship from Google experts and networking opportunities to help grow their businesses. Check out our website to learn more and apply.
html:
Google’s work in health is centered around advancing healthcare through AI. And that includes supporting healthtech entrepreneurs through programs like Google for Startups Growth Academy: AI for Health. Applications for the third cohort of this equity-free program are open until January 31 to seed to Series A startups based in Europe, Africa and the Middle East that use AI to address critical health and wellbeing challenges.

Over three months, selected startup teams receive tailored workshops, mentorship from Google experts and networking opportunities to help grow their businesses. Check out our website to learn more and apply.
